thread.section_title: Travel news, tips and features - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: Souvenir circuit: Napa Valley’s best artisanal finds
thread.title_full: Souvenir circuit: Napa Valley’s best artisanal finds - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Janet Fletcher
title: Souvenir circuit: Napa Valley’s best artisanal finds
text:
Photo: Mimi Giboin Pottery by Kelly Farley of Pope Valley Pottery. Pottery by Kelly Farley of Pope Valley Pottery.
Of course you’re bringing wine back from your Napa Valley excursion. But save room in the trunk for other treasures, too. Local potters, jammers and chocolatiers produce tableware and artisan edibles with nary a grape. Get a jump on holiday shopping with these handmade gems. Pottery by Kelly Farley of Pope Valley Pottery. Pottery by Kelly Farley of Pope Valley Pottery.
